definition[0]: a container with holes in the lid, used to shake salt, sugar etc onto food
definition[1]: a container in which drinks are mixed
definition[2]: a small container for shaking dice
definition[3]: a member of a US religious group who lived together and had a simple way of life. Shaker furniture is made in the plain, simple, and attractive style that Shakers used to make things
definition[4]: relating to a style of wooden furniture of the kind made by the Shakers, which is known for being simple and well-made, and has become fashionable
example[2]: an attractive set of Shaker chairs
